text: Ladies Must Dress is a 1927 American silent romantic comedy film directed by Victor Heerman and starring Virginia Valli, Lawrence Gray and Hallam Cooley.Solomon p.306 It marked the screen debut of the future star Nancy Carroll. ==Cast== * Virginia Valli as Eve * Lawrence Gray as Joe * Hallam Cooley as Art * Nancy Carroll as Mazie * Earle Foxe as George Ward, Jr * Clarence Wilson as Office Manager * William H. Tooker as Mr. Ward, Sr ==References== ==Bibliography== * Solomon, Aubrey. The Fox Film Corporation, 1915-1935: A History and Filmography. McFarland, 2011. ==External links== * Category:1927 films Category:1927 romantic comedy films Category:American films Category:American romantic comedy films Category:Films directed by Victor Heerman Category:American silent feature films Category:English- language films Category:Fox Film films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1927 comedy films
title: Ladies Must Dress
